summary: An attempt to implement Hunger into Skyrim. It doesn\'t work, and am uploading it to hope that people can fix it. Will be linking to this on the Bethesda forums so I may have a chance at getting this working.
descriptionHtml:
I\'ve got the variable \"fAAGGHunger\" in Global as a float. The quest which SHOULD make the variable drop every so often doesn\'t work. Haven\'t the faintest idea on why it doesn\'t.

If someone could message me if they manage to get it fixed and working, that would be swell. Will give credit where credit is due when it gets fixed. (Message me the link to the fix on a site such as Mediafire, as an attachment on the forums, or w/e.)
author: GomuGomu64
